mapper.select: SELECT CAR_NAME, CLASS_NAME, CAR_PRICE, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "UPLOAD_DATE" FROM CARNAME JOIN CAR_FILE USING(FILE_NUM) JOIN CLASSIFICATION USING(CLASS_CODE) ORDER BY UPLOAD_DATE DESC

SELECT CAR_NAME, CLASS_NAME, CAR_PRICE, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "UPLOAD_DATE" FROM CARNAME JOIN CAR_FILE USING(FILE_NUM) JOIN CLASSIFICATION USING(CLASS_CODE)
WHERE CLASS_CODE = #{classCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_FILE(FILE_NUM, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, UPLOAD_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_FILE_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{originalName}, #{uploadName}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO CARNAME(CAR_NAME, CLASS_CODE, FILE_NUM, CAR_PRICE) VALUES (#{carName}, #{classCode}, SEQ_FILE_NUM.CURRVAL, #{carPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT CAR_NAME, CLASS_CODE, CAR_PRICE, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, INVEN_CODE, FILE_NUM FROM CARNAME JOIN CAR_FILE USING(FILE_NUM) JOIN MANAGEMENT USING(CAR_NAME) WHERE CAR_NAME = #{carName}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_FILE SET ORIGINAL_NAME = #{originalName}, UPLOAD_NAME = #{uploadName}, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NUM = #{fileNum}
mapper.select: SELECT INVEN_CODE, INVEN_NAME, INVEN_PAY, INVEN_NUM, ITEM_CODE, TO_CHAR(INVEN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "INVEN_DATE", ITEM_NAME FROM INVENTORY JOIN ITEM USING (ITEM_CODE) ORDER BY INVEN_DATE DESC
SELECT INVEN_CODE, INVEN_NAME, INVEN_PAY, INVEN_NUM, ITEM_CODE, TO_CHAR(INVEN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "INVEN_DATE", ITEM_NAME FROM INVENTORY JOIN ITEM USING (ITEM_CODE)

SELECT INVEN_CODE, INVEN_NAME, INVEN_PAY, INVEN_NUM, ITEM_CODE, TO_CHAR(INVEN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "INVEN_DATE", ITEM_NAME FROM INVENTORY JOIN ITEM USING (ITEM_CODE) WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} ORDER BY INVEN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCK(STOCK_PKNO, INVEN_CODE, STOCK_NUM, STOCK_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_STOCK_PKNO.NEXTVAL, #{invenCode}, #{stockNum}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT EX_NUM, CAR_NAME, EX_PRICE, MEMBER_PHONE, TO_CHAR(EX_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "EX_DATE" FROM EX_CAR WHERE DEALER_PHONE = #{dealerPhone} ORDER BY EX_DATE DESC
SELECT EX_NUM, CAR_NAME, EX_INVEN, EX_PRICE, MEMBER_PHONE, DEALER_PHONE, TO_CHAR(EX_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "EX_DATE" FROM EX_CAR WHERE EX_NUM = #{exNum}
